title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: JIESHUO RTX3070 8GB Non LHR GDDR6 256bit Computer Graphics Card,Nvidia RTX 3070M 8GB Mining or gaming pc, rtx 3070 DP*2 2HDMIhttps://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005003926731754.html?This video card uses a mobile video chip, which is installed through an adapter on the board of a standard video card. The price is very small. Has anyone had experience with these video cards?

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on October 26, 2022, 12:33:16 PMJIESHUO RTX3070 8GB Non LHR GDDR6 256bit Computer Graphics Card,Nvidia RTX 3070M 8GB Mining or gaming pc, rtx 3070 DP*2 2HDMIhttps://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005003926731754.html?This video card uses a mobile video chip, which is installed through an adapter on the board of a standard video card. The price is very small. Has anyone had experience with these video cards?I saw months ago a person who mined with this cards - very very very efficient and over 62mh like the normal desktop version.The link is brokenYou can also find the AMD RX6600M 8GB JIESHUO. But i have no infos about this card.

The price is very small. Has anyone had experience with these video cards?I saw months ago a person who mined with this cards - very very very efficient and over 62mh like the normal desktop version.The link is brokenYou can also find the AMD RX6600M 8GB JIESHUO. But i have no infos about this card.If the link does not open, try searching by the name on www.aliexpress.com yourself. I've read good reviews, but I'm wondering how reliable these graphics cards are over 3-4 years.If you have experience in mining on mobile chips of the 2000 series, please write.

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: Yes I have seen some people buying this graphic card and it works very well, some are using it for mining too, since you find this on aliexpress I am positive you will find some reviews on the website.
